(-i)|(-D)|(-L)|(-g)|(-o)|(-l)|(-t)|(-u)|.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-silent.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-fa.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

(-w)|(-W)|(-s)|(-p).explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-n.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-dumpheader.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-e.explanation: The -e flag on linux Disables command editing and history support, however on uss -e is Equivalent to EXIT. There is no equivalant for the linux version

-v.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-version.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

(-a)|(--alias)|(-A)|(--all-fqdns)|(-b)|(.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

(-d)|(--domain).explanation: On linux -d or --domain Displays the name of the DNS domain. On uss -d print trace messages for problem diagnosis. There is no equivalant for the linux version

--short.explanation: On uss use -s to display the short host name.

--help.explanation: On uss use -h to display the usage message

-set.explanation: This flag is not available on uss

(-D)|(-T)|(-K)|(-M)|(-t)|(I)|(-n).explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-v.explanation: -v is not available on uss, -d is equivalent
This flag is not available on uss

(-m)|(-q)|(-v)|(-4)|(-6).explanation: This flag is not available on uss

-d.explanation: -d is not available on uss -display is the equivalant

--line-number.explanation: --line-number is not available on uss, -n is equivalent

(-B)|(--before-context).explanation: The linux flag -B Displays num lines of leading context before matching lines. The equivalant on uss is -P

lsof.explanation: Try the equivalant for uss: zlsof

ping.explanation: Try the equivalant for uss: oping

(-4).explanation: The equivalant on uss is: -A ipv4

(-6).explanation: The equivalant on uss is: -A ipv6

(-[aAbBdDFfhilLmMNnOpQqrRStTUVw]).explanation: This flag is not available on uss

traceroute.explanation: Try the equivalant for uss: otracert

which.explanation: Try the equivalant for uss: type
